job_description:
Requisition Number: 61261

Corning is vital to progress – in the industries we help shape and in the world we share.

We invent life-changing technologies using materials science. Our scientific and manufacturing expertise, boundless curiosity, and commitment to purposeful invention place us at the center of the way the world interacts, works, learns, and lives.

Our sustained investment in research, development, and invention means we’re always ready to solve the toughest challenges alongside our customers.

Our Optical Communications segment has recently evolved from being a manufacturer of optical fiber and cable, hardware and equipment to being a comprehensive provider of industry-leading optical solutions across the broader communications industry.This segment is classified into two main product groupings – carrier network and enterprise network. The carrier network product group consists primarily of products and solutions for optical-based communications infrastructure for services such as video, data and voice communications. The enterprise network product group consists primarily of optical-based communication networks sold to businesses, governments and individuals for their own use.

Job Description

We are looking for a talented React developer to join our front-end development team. We are a small but mighty group of technology professionals, and we are looking for a flexible, resilient, and energetic individual who is interested in tackling interesting technology challenges (did we mention we are the world leaders in RF network design?).

As a React Web Developer, you will be responsible for implementing new features using React and other standard tools in the React ecosystem. Your duties will include designing software solutions to meet project requirements, maintaining and refactoring existing code, writing tests, and fixing bugs; all while simultaneously ensuring we have the best, most delightful user experience.

If this sounds interesting to you, why don’t we have a conversation about it?

What You Will Be Doing

We are looking for a Software Developer to work with our engineering and product teams to improve the awesomeness of our applications and services. You will be part of a scrum team of 6-9 people, and your responsibilities will include:
Designing and developing new web applications using the latest technologies, notably React
Understanding key server-side web development concepts
Participating in the analysis and design of new product features
Adhering to and promoting best practices standards
Executing end-to-end software development and deployment in a scrum team
Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts
Participate in code reviews and write unit, integration, and load tests as necessary
Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts
Monitoring and improving front-end performance
Documenting application changes and updates
What You Will Bring Along

Here is what we are looking for – if you have it, let’s talk
BSc degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field (Equivalent experience will be considered in lieu of)
Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in web development
You are passionate about creating reusable UX assets and are familiar with design systems
In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and front-end languages and libraries
Strong knowledge of React and React development tools
Strong knowledge of Microservices architecture and frameworks is an asset
Experience with SVG, CAD libraries, Git, Azure DevOps, and Agile in a CI/CD environment is an asset
Creative, detail-oriented, autonomous, and team player
Analytical and organizing skills
Strong troubleshooting skills
What Can We Offer You?
A competitive salary and benefits packages
Flexible work policies and strong work-life balance
Professional development and leadership opportunities
Working Arrangement: Flexible
